dict.acceptation: 四分之一；一刻钟；地区；（美式足球的）一节；
把…四等分；供…住宿；使（士兵）驻扎；

sent.orig: Handelsbanken posted a 39% quarter-on-quarter jump in operating profits in the fourth quarter of 2008.
sent.trans: 2008年第4季度，该银行的营运利润比去年同季度上涨39%。

sent.orig: As the quarter, pricing, features, steel can actually predict the price trend in the next quarter.
sent.trans: 由于季度定价的特性，钢厂事实上可以预知下一季度的价格趋势。

sent.orig: In the first week the moon is in its first quarter, in the third week it is in its last quarter.
sent.trans: 第一个星期月亮处于上弦月的状态，第三个星期月亮处于下弦月的状态。

sent.orig: In the third quarter of this year, gold demand hit a record quarter all-time high.
sent.trans: 今年第三季度黄金需求创下有史以来最高季度纪录。

sent.orig: China does not publish quarter-on-quarter comparisons which are widely used in developed countries.
sent.trans: 中国不发布发达国家广泛采用的季度环比增幅比较数据。
